message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe its value exceeds $12000 to us. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique benefits and features that align with your requirements. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
